short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sets a timer for reddit use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sets a timer for reddit use and locks you out once timer reaches zero. It resets automatically every day, or you can manually set time in options page. Maximum time limit of 720 minutes.
